say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Jeremy")=="Hello Jeremy!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class HelloSayer:
    "Say hello to `to` using `say_hello`"
    def __init__(self, to): self.to = to

    def say(self):
        "Do the saying"
        return say_hello(self.to)
{% endraw %}
